doc.title: Her Majesty, Queen Victoria, Reviewing the Honorable Artillery
doc.plot: "Her Majesty, the Queen, with Princesses Christian and Louise in the royal carriage at Windsor reviewing the Honorable Artillery. On this occasion the Queen graciously dispensed with the use of a parasol, permitting the Biograph to secure an excellent portrait. This was one of the last occasions on which she appeared at a public function."
